name: Reset Earth
description:
Reset Earth

This game is a time machine-based game in which you go to the past to save mankind.

and explore the things no one had seen before.

Use HeadPhones to enjoy the music and feel of the Game.

BYOG Game JAM 2021

Theme based --"RESET"

Controls----

"A" and"D "to control the time machine 

GamePlay--

Avoid any collision with the time machine.  If a collision will happen the time machine will send you to the present before it gets destroyed so that at the present you still can try on more time :)/

Do Share your feedback.

Disclaimer--

All assets used in this game are free to use with no copyright. :)
